Name: Argus Panoptes
About the game: Argus Panoptes is a 2D platformer with engaging mechanics in an unforgiving world. Find your way through cryptic ruins and debris, in a post apocalyptic universe, where mythology meets a futuristic dystopia of ever-present surveillance. Try staying vigilant, cleverly manipulating the invasive, all-watching eyes of Argus, in a dark, obsessive quest for freedom. Hard-to-master Physics Mechanics Spawn forcefields to bounce the eye Use your 'Force' ability to alter the trajectory of the eye Use your 'Slow' ability to gain more control over the eye Combine your abilities to precisely navigate the eye through the levels Features Quick tutorial levels to get you up to speed with the mechanics Compare your time with other players on global leaderboards Survival (time-attack) mode
